Name: Outside The Box
About the game: An erotic Narrative Adventure- Outside the Box is jam packed with anthropomorphic twinks, environmental puzzles, and sizzling hot artwork! Experience one of Tokifuji's classic works, re-imagined as a videogame! - - PLOT - Milo comes home to quite the scene- his roommate getting it on with a random stranger! Just the thing to get Milo quite... ahem- 'worked up.' It's been a while since he's gotten any- but lucky for him, it seems like the opportunity for him to have some fun of his own might be just around the corner. - - FEATURES - PUZZLE SOLVING: Get hands on and interact with the environment to advance the story! NARRATIVE ADVENTURE: New immersive experience with animated transitions! HOT GUYS: Enjoy a number of steamy, sex illustrations featuring Toki's trademark guys!
